StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: DELETECAMPUS
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.DELETECAMPUS(pName IN VARCHAR2) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN&lt;br/&gt; DELETE FROM Campus_table campus&lt;br/&gt; WHERE campus.nameCampus = pName;&lt;br/&gt; COMMIT;&lt;br/&gt;END deleteCampus;
